Using Spacewar example:
Save crosscutting map file and then compare the crosscutting with the current build:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ajdt.core.model.ModelComparison.matchJavaElements(ModelComparison.java:77)
at org.eclipse.ajdt.core.model.ModelComparison.removeMatchingRel(ModelComparison.java:85)
at org.eclipse.ajdt.core.model.ModelComparison.compare(ModelComparison.java:49)
at org.eclipse.ajdt.internal.ui.diff.ChangesView.performComparison(ChangesView.java:389)
at org.eclipse.ajdt.internal.ui.diff.CompareAction.run(CompareAction.java:66)
Looks like a problem in AspectJCore.create() with handle identifiers representing pointcuts in classes

Fixed and test added to AJCoreTest
